verses.t: Unto the angel{G3588} of the church{G1577} of Ephesus{G3588} write{G1125}; These things{G3592} saith{G3004} he that holdeth{G2902} the{G792} seven{G2033} stars{G792} in{G1722} his{G846} right hand{G1188}, who walketh{G4043} in{G1722} the midst{G3319} of the{G3087} seven{G2033} golden{G5552} candlesticks{G3087};

I know{G1492} thy{G4675} works{G3588}, and{G2532} thy{G4675} labour{G3588}, and{G2532} thy{G4675} patience{G3588}, and{G2532} how{G3754} thou canst{G1410} not{G3756} bear{G941} them which are evil{G2556}: and{G2532} thou hast tried{G3985} them which say{G5335} they are{G1511} apostles{G652}, and{G2532} are{G1526} not{G3756}, and{G2532} hast found{G2147} them{G846} liars{G5571}:
And{G2532} hast borne{G941}, and{G2532} hast{G2192} patience{G5281}, and{G2532} for{G1223} my{G3450} name's{G3588} sake{G1223} hast laboured{G2872}, and{G2532} hast{G2577} not{G3756} fainted{G2577}.
Nevertheless{G235} I have{G2192} somewhat against{G2596} thee{G4675}, because{G3754} thou hast left{G863} thy{G4675} first{G4413} love{G3588}.

Remember{G3421} therefore{G3767} from whence{G4159} thou art fallen{G1601}, and{G2532} repent{G3340}, and{G2532} do{G4160} the{G2041} first{G4413} works{G2041}; or else{G1487} I will come{G2064} unto thee{G4671} quickly{G5035}, and{G2532} will remove{G2795} thy{G4675} candlestick{G3588} out{G1537} of{G3588} his{G846} place{G5117}, except{G1437} thou repent{G3340}."ei de mee" "or else". "ean mee" "except".
But{G235} this{G5124} thou hast{G2192}, that{G3754} thou hatest{G3404} the deeds{G3588} of the Nicolaitans{G3588}, which{G3739} I also{G2504} hate{G3404}.

He that hath{G2192} an ear{G3775}, let him hear{G191} what{G5101} the Spirit{G3588} saith{G3004} unto the churches{G3588}; To{G3528} him{G846} that overcometh{G3528} will I give{G1325} to eat{G5315} of{G1537} the tree{G3588} of life{G3588}, which{G3739} is{G2076} in{G1722} the midst{G3319} of the paradise{G3588} of God{G3588}.

And{G2532} unto the angel{G3588}of the church{G3588} in Smyrna{G4668} write{G1125}; These things{G3592} saith{G3004} the first{G4413} and{G2532} the last{G2078}, which{G3739} was{G1096} dead{G3498}, and{G2532} is alive{G2198};

I know{G1492} thy{G4675} works{G3588}, and{G2532} tribulation{G3588}, and{G2532} poverty{G3588}, (but{G1161} thou art{G1488} rich{G4145}) and{G2532} I know the blasphemy{G3588} of them which say{G3004} they{G1438} are{G1511} Jews{G2453}, and{G2532} are{G1526} not{G3756}, but{G235} are the synagogue{G4864} of Satan{G3588}.

Fear{G5399} none{G3367} of those things which{G3739} thou shalt{G3195} suffer{G3958}: behold{G2400}, the devil{G1228} shall{G3195} cast{G906} some of{G1537} you{G5216} into{G1519} prison{G5438}, that{G2443} ye may be tried{G3985}; and{G2532} ye shall have{G2192} tribulation{G2347} ten{G1176} days{G2250}: be thou{G1096} faithful{G4103} unto{G891} death{G2288}, and{G2532} I will give{G1325} thee{G4671} a crown{G3588} of life{G3588}.

He that hath{G2192} an ear{G3775}, let him hear{G191} what{G5101} the Spirit{G3588} saith{G3004} unto the churches{G3588}; He that overcometh{G3528} shall{G91} not{G3756} be hurt{G91} of{G1537} the second{G1208} death{G3588}."ou mee", "not"

And{G2532} to the angel{G3588} of the church{G1577} in{G1722} Pergamos{G4010} write{G1125}; These things{G3592} saith{G3004} he which hath{G2192} the{G3588} sharp{G3691} sword{G4501} with two edges{G1366};

I know{G1492} thy{G4675} works{G3588}, and{G2532} where{G4226} thou dwellest{G2730}, even where{G3699} Satan's{G3588} seat{G3588} is: and{G2532} thou holdest fast{G2902} my{G3450} name{G3588}, and{G2532} hast{G720} not{G3756} denied{G720} my{G3450} faith{G3588}, even{G2532} in{G1722} those days{G3588} wherein{G1722} Antipas{G493} was my{G3450} faithful{G4103} martyr{G3588}, who{G3739} was slain{G615} among{G3844} you{G5213}, where{G3699} Satan{G3588} dwelleth{G2730}."en hais", "wherein"

But{G235} I have{G2192} a few things{G3641} against{G2596} thee{G4675}, because{G3754} thou hast{G2192} there{G1563} them that hold{G2902} the doctrine{G3588} of Balaam{G903}, who{G3739} taught{G1321} Balac{G904} to cast{G906} a stumblingblock{G4625} before{G1799} the children{G3588} of Israel{G2474}, to eat{G5315} things sacrificed unto idols{G1494}, and{G2532} to commit fornication{G4203}.
So{G3779} hast{G2192} thou{G4771} also{G2532} them that hold{G2902} the doctrine{G3588} of the Nicolaitans{G3588}, which thing{G3739} I hate{G3404}.

Repent{G3340}; or{G1487} else{G3361} I will come{G2064} unto thee{G4671} quickly{G5035}, and{G2532} will fight{G4170} against{G3326} them{G846} with{G1722} the sword{G3588} of{G3588} my{G3450} mouth{G4750}."ei de mee" "or else".

He that hath{G2192} an ear{G3775}, let him hear{G191} what{G5101} the Spirit{G3588} saith{G3004} unto the churches{G3588}; To him{G846} that overcometh{G3528} will I give{G1325} to eat{G5315} of{G575} the{G3131} hidden{G2928} manna{G3131}and{G2532} will give{G1325} him{G846} a white{G3022} stone{G5586}, and{G2532} in{G1909} the stone{G3588} a{G3686} new{G2537} name{G3686} written{G1125}, which{G3739} no man{G3762} knoweth{G1097} saving{G1487} he that receiveth{G2983} it."ei mee" "saving".

And{G2532} unto the angel{G3588} of the church{G1577} in{G1722} Thyatira{G2363} write{G1125}; These things{G3592} saith{G3004} the Son{G3588} of God{G3588}, who hath{G2192} his{G846} eyes{G3588} like unto{G5613} a flame{G5395} of fire{G4442}, and{G2532} his{G846} feet{G3588} are like{G3664} fine brass{G5474};

I know{G1492} thy{G4675} works{G3588}, and{G2532} charity{G3588}, and{G2532} service{G3588}, and{G2532} faith{G3588}, and{G2532} thy{G4675} patience{G3588}, and{G2532} thy{G4675} works{G3588}; and{G2532} the last{G2078} to be more{G4119} than the first{G4413}.

Notwithstanding{G235} I have{G2192} a few things{G3641} against{G2596} thee{G4675}, because{G3754} thou sufferest{G1439} that woman{G3588} Jezebel{G2403}, which calleth{G3004} herself{G1438} a prophetess{G4398}, to teach{G1321} and{G2532} to seduce{G4105} my{G1699} servants{G1401} to commit fornication{G4203}, and{G2532} to eat{G5315} things sacrificed unto idols{G1494}.
And{G2532} I gave{G1325} her{G846} space{G5550} to{G2443} repent{G3340} of{G1537} her{G846} fornication{G3588}; and{G2532} she repented{G3340} not{G3756}.

Behold{G2400}, I{G1473} will cast{G906} her{G846} into{G1519} a bed{G2825}, and{G2532} them that commit adultery{G3431} with{G3326} her{G846} into{G1519} great{G3173} tribulation{G2347}, except{G1437} they repent{G3340} of{G1537} their{G846} deeds{G3588}."ean mee" "except".

And{G2532} I will kill{G615} her{G846} children{G3588} with{G1722} death{G2288}; and{G2532} all{G3956} the churches{G3588} shall know{G1097} that{G3754} I{G1473} am{G1510} he which searcheth{G2045} the reins{G3510} and{G2532} hearts{G2588}: and{G2532} I will give{G1325} unto{G5213} every one of{G1538} you{G5213} according to{G2596} your{G5216} works{G3588}."humin hekastoo" is "unto every one of you". "hekastoo" is adjective here so probably my tagging is right.

But{G1161} unto you{G5213} I say{G3004}, and{G2532} unto the rest{G3062} in{G1722} Thyatira{G2363}, as many as{G3745} have{G2192} not{G3756} this{G3778} doctrine{G3588}, and{G2532} which{G3748} have{G1097} not{G3756} known{G1097} the depths{G3588} of Satan{G3588}, as{G5613} they speak{G3004}; I will put{G906} upon{G1909} you{G5209} none{G3756} other{G243} burden{G922}.
But{G4133} that which{G3739} ye have{G2192} already hold fast{G2902} till{G891} I come{G2240}."achris hou an eexoo" is "till I come".
And{G2532} he that overcometh{G3528}, and{G2532} keepeth{G5083} my{G3450} works{G3588} unto{G891} the end{G5056}, to him{G846} will I give{G1325} power{G1849} over{G1909} the nations{G3588}:

And{G2532} he shall rule{G4165} them{G846} with{G1722} a rod{G4464} of iron{G4603}; as{G5613}the vessels{G3588} of a potter{G2764} shall they be broken to shivers{G4937}: even as{G5613} I{G2504} received{G2983} of{G3844} my{G3450} Father{G3588}.Actually "hoos kai" is "even as", but "kai" is joined to "egoo" by crasis.
And{G2532} I will give{G1325} him{G846} the{G3588} morning{G4407} star{G792}.
He that hath{G2192} an ear{G3775}, let him hear{G191} what{G5101} the Spirit{G3588} saith{G3004} unto the churches{G3588}.
